item.description: Evidence links Jack Bauer to a dastardly assassination. In order to prevent a war with Russia, the White House orders a trade of Jack's nephew for the circuit board, and puts Jack in custody so he cannot stop the exchange.

shorttext.p: Evidence links Jack Bauer to a dastardly assassination. In order to prevent a war with Russia, the White House orders a trade of Jack's nephew for the circuit board, and puts Jack in custody so he cannot stop the exchange.

item.title: Vikings
item.description: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

shorttext.p: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

shorttext.p: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

shorttext.p: Walt and Jesse try to up their game by making more of the crystal every week for Tuco. Unfortunately, some of the ingredients they need is not easy to find. Meanwhile, Skyler realizes that her sister is a shoplifter.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

shorttext.p: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.description: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany Pennsatucky Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry first meets Alex to cope with everything that is happening.

shorttext.p: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany Pennsatucky Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry first meets Alex to cope with everything that is happening.

item.title: New Girl
item.description: Jess pretends to be a fan of the Pistons in an attempt to befriend Coach, to Nick's dismay, who is a Bulls fan. Meanwhile, Schmidt is assigned to mentor an elderly colleague at work and Winston discovers a new career path.

shorttext.p: Jess pretends to be a fan of the Pistons in an attempt to befriend Coach, to Nick's dismay, who is a Bulls fan. Meanwhile, Schmidt is assigned to mentor an elderly colleague at work and Winston discovers a new career path.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

shorttext.p: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt discovers Jesse broke into his house and attempted to burn it down. Walt wants to protect his family so he moves them into a hotel for a few nights. Jesse decides to work with Hank in order to take down Walt.

shorttext.p: Walt discovers Jesse broke into his house and attempted to burn it down. Walt wants to protect his family so he moves them into a hotel for a few nights. Jesse decides to work with Hank in order to take down Walt.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

shorttext.p: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

item.title: Hawaii Five-0
item.description: McGarrett is convinced that a psychiatrist murdered one of her patients, but will she get the last laugh? Meanwhile, Catherine discovers that an assassin is on the island and is looking for Doris McGarrett.

shorttext.p: McGarrett is convinced that a psychiatrist murdered one of her patients, but will she get the last laugh? Meanwhile, Catherine discovers that an assassin is on the island and is looking for Doris McGarrett.

item.title: The Good Wife
item.description: As Diane prepares for big changes as she leaves the firm, the firm faces a politically-motivated sexual harassment suit. Meanwhile, Jackie makes trouble for the inauguration, and Alicia and Cary's departure from the firm is imminent.

shorttext.p: As Diane prepares for big changes as she leaves the firm, the firm faces a politically-motivated sexual harassment suit. Meanwhile, Jackie makes trouble for the inauguration, and Alicia and Cary's departure from the firm is imminent.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

shorttext.p: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

item.title: Downton Abbey
item.description: Mary receives a letter from Matthew's effects, naming her as his sole heir and therefore the owner of half the estate. Encouraged by Violet, she agrees to shadow Tom and learn more about the running of Downton.

shorttext.p: Mary receives a letter from Matthew's effects, naming her as his sole heir and therefore the owner of half the estate. Encouraged by Violet, she agrees to shadow Tom and learn more about the running of Downton.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion
item.description: Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 5: The Wolf and the Lion

Catelyn has captured Tyrion and plans to bring him to her sister, Lysa Arryn, at The Vale, to be tried for his, supposed, crimes against Bran. Robert plans to have Daenerys killed, but Eddard refuses to be a part of it and quits.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

shorttext.p: Robb and Catelyn arrive at Riverrun for Lord Hoster Tully's funeral. Tywin names Tyrion the new Master of Coin. Arya says goodbye to Hot Pie. The Night's Watch returns to Craster's. Brianne and Jamie are taken prisoner.

item.title: House of Cards
item.description: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

shorttext.p: Congressman Francis Underwood has been declined the chair for Secretary of State. He's now gathering his own team to plot his revenge. Zoe Barnes, a reporter for the Washington Herald, will do anything to get her big break.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

shorttext.p: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

shorttext.p: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train
item.description: Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

shorttext.p: Season 4, Ep. 4: Strangers on a Train

Fiona continues her secret affair with Robbie. The situation nearly boils over, when Mike shows up at Robbie's apartment while Fiona's inside. Fiona is able to hide just in time before her infidelity can be exposed.

item.title: The Following
item.description: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

shorttext.p: Mike Weston recognizes Roderick as one of the men who beat him up. He gets away but the FBI lock down the local sheriff's office until they figure out just who they can trust. Agent Nick Donovan orders an information blackout.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings
item.description: When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 4: Last Reasoning of Kings

When Babbit's past comes back to haunt him, Frank clashes with Charlie to protect his mentor and seeks medical answers. The community reels after losing a member, while new security measures affect the scientists' work.

item.description: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

shorttext.p: The Russian and US Presidents are set to sign an anti-terror treaty when assassinations rock Los Angeles, a call from a distressed Chloe forces Jack into action and President Logan's wife believes there may be a conspiracy.

item.title: Strike Back
item.description: Section 20 tracks facilitator James Leatherby in Beirut. They continue to use Kamali in operations on Leatherby. Dalton is making bad decision due to her emotions over Baxter's death. Section 20 acts on tips about al-Zuhari.

shorttext.p: Section 20 tracks facilitator James Leatherby in Beirut. They continue to use Kamali in operations on Leatherby. Dalton is making bad decision due to her emotions over Baxter's death. Section 20 acts on tips about al-Zuhari.

item.description: Naomi helps Jordan's sister, Elizabeth, out of a messy political situation, and in turn makes a deal with his mother. Teddy returns to Beverly Hills after Dixon tells him that Michela has gone missing and asks him to find her.

shorttext.p: Naomi helps Jordan's sister, Elizabeth, out of a messy political situation, and in turn makes a deal with his mother. Teddy returns to Beverly Hills after Dixon tells him that Michela has gone missing and asks him to find her.

item.title: Defiance
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax
item.description: Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax

Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

shorttext.p: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

shorttext.p: Kevin's declaration that everybody marries their parents ruins Marshall and Lily's evening, but will anything keep Barney from getting lucky with Nora? And will Kevin finally get fed up with Ted and Robin's close relationship?

item.title: The 100
item.description: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

shorttext.p: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven
item.description: Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 7: The Vault of Heaven

Clarice's life is in danger. The fellowship enters the Vault of Heaven, which holds many mysteries and deceptions. Lucrezia reaches her destination, meeting someone along the way. Zoroaster and Nico plan their escape.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: Prince Charming desperately searches for a way to get Snow White and Emma back from the Enchanted Forest. Meanwhile, the Seven Dwarves discover that if anyone leaves Storybrooke, they will lose the memory of their true identity.

shorttext.p: Prince Charming desperately searches for a way to get Snow White and Emma back from the Enchanted Forest. Meanwhile, the Seven Dwarves discover that if anyone leaves Storybrooke, they will lose the memory of their true identity.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

shorttext.p: A desperate Bill tries to ferry Warlow away from the faerie plain, but Sookie is having none of it. Meanwhile, Eric arrives at vamp camp, looking to inflict serious human damage. Bill feels the pull of Lilith's sirens.

shorttext.p: Evidence links Jack Bauer to a dastardly assassination. In order to prevent a war with Russia, the White House orders a trade of Jack's nephew for the circuit board, and puts Jack in custody so he cannot stop the exchange.

item.title: Vikings
item.description: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

shorttext.p: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.
